title: Gst Council To Mull Proposal To Do Away With 5% Rate Next Month. See Details | Mint - Mint
content: Gst Council To Mull Proposal To Do Away With 5% Rate Next Month. See Details | Mint  MintView Full coverage on Google News
description: Discussions are on to raise the 5% slab to either 7 or 8 or 9%, a final call will be taken by the GST Council which comprises finance ministers of both Centre and states, as per sources
